name: Cast Cats
storyline:
Welcome to the exciting world of cute cartoon cats! Get ready for an exciting adventure in the 'Find the Differences' genre, where 42 levels of exciting challenges await you. Each level represents two similar images with six differences to find.

What makes this game special? Each kitty has a unique profession or hobby, from doctor and engineer to rock musician and blogger. You will enjoy the simple and pleasing visuals and accompanying music that will immerse you in the atmosphere of the game.

This game is suitable for both adults and children, and will be a great way to spend your time in a fun way. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of professional cats and develop your skills of observation and attention.
summary: Welcome to the exciting world of cute cartoon cats! Get ready for an exciting adventure in the 'Find the Differences' genre, where 42 levels of exciting challenges await you.
